translation.login.title: Log in
translation.panel.title: Manage events
translation.panel.name: Name
translation.panel.deleteEvent.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this event? This cannot be undone.
translation.editor.basic.name: Event name
translation.editor.basic.urlExists: URL-address is already in use for this event
translation.editor.basic.hiddenEventInfo: You can only access hidden events via a URL-address. Events saved as draft cannot be seen as a user despite this setting
translation.editor.basic.dateWarning: The event will show up in the calendar only if it as an ending time
translation.editor.basic.markdown: You can use Markdown in the description
translation.editor.quotas.name: Quota name
translation.editor.quotas.jointQuota: In addition use a joint quota
translation.editor.quotas.help: People will be added to the open quota automatically if they did not get into their chosen quota.
translation.editor.quotas.oneInfo: If there is only one quota, you can give the event's name
translation.editor.quotas.drag: You can organize the quotas by dragging them to the left
translation.editor.quotas.oneInfoRestriction: If there is no limit to the quota, leave the field empty.
translation.editor.questions.name: Name
translation.editor.questions.nameMandatory: Name is a mandatory question. Attendee decides if the name is publicly visible.
translation.editor.questions.nameNotMandatory: If name is asked, the attendee can decide whethe the name is publicly visible
translation.editor.questions.emailMandatory: Email is a mandatory question. Participants will be sent a confirmation email and an email notification if they were moved from the open quota.
translation.editor.questions.emailNotMandatory: If email is not asked participans won't get a confirmation email or an email notification whether they were moved from the open quota.
translation.editor.questions.question: Question
translation.editor.signups.noSignups: There are no signups for this event yet. You will see the signups on this page when there participants.
translation.editor.signups.delete.confirm: Are you sure? This cannot be undone.
